messages.message:
Hello team,
We are rolling out Kubernetes version upgrade from 1.24 to 1.25 for sandboxes.
With this change, the existing sandboxes will be upgraded to the 1.25 version when the upgrade pipeline is executed and all the new sandboxes will be on 1.25 k8s version by default.
In case you want want your sandboxes to be on `1.24` then it can be specified in `Advanced Args` by adding `"EKS_VERSION": "1.24"`.
*Note: The cluster cannot be upgraded to an older version, so you cannot move back from 1.25 to 1.24.* 
cc: @jayapandian.ponraj
